name: Empty Desert (Wagon Road)
description: A desolate stretch of dusty wagon road, where the vast, empty expanse is briefly 'enlivened' by the relentless sun. The path here is faint, a mere suggestion of passage across the vast, indifferent landscape. The wagon road continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the vast, undeveloped frontier. The air is still, thick with dust and the scent of dry sagebrush, broken only by the distant cry of a hawk, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
